Class SceneNavigator

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.SceneNavigator
public final class SceneNavigator extends Object
Utility class for navigating between scenes and loading FXML files.

  • Method Details

    • loadScene

      public static javafx.scene.Scene loadScene(String fxmlFile, Consumer<javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader> controllerSetup)
      Loads an FXML file and creates a scene.
      Parameters:
      fxmlFile - The FXML file path (e.g., "mainMenu.fxml")
      controllerSetup - Optional consumer to configure the controller after loading
      Returns:
      The created Scene, or null if loading failed

    • navigateToScene

      public static boolean navigateToScene(javafx.stage.Stage stage, String fxmlFile, Consumer<javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader> controllerSetup)
      Loads an FXML file, creates a scene, and sets it on the stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - The stage to set the scene on
      fxmlFile - The FXML file path (e.g., "mainMenu.fxml")
      controllerSetup - Optional consumer to configure the controller after loading
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • loadController

      public static <T> T loadController(String fxmlFile, Class<T> controllerClass)
      Loads an FXML file and returns the controller.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The controller type
      Parameters:
      fxmlFile - The FXML file path
      controllerClass - The class of the controller
      Returns:
      The controller instance, or null if loading failed
